fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Imprint on a player at night, roleblocking them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
The first person to vote them the next day is instantly dealt a Powerful Attack. If your target is lynched, your role is publicly revealed.
If you target a Twilight player and they are lynched, whoever you imprint tonight will be dealt a Powerful Attack instead.
Roleblock and redirection immunity
Werewolf Fixation: During the night, you may decide what your imprinted target appears as if lynched. If you choose to make them appear as a Twilight role, you get to deal a Powerful Attack if they are lynched, regardless of what they actually were

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Take out all who disturb this terrible romance
